DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study 1 ) test safety vaccine find effect , good and/or bad , , 2 ) find vaccine stimulates immune system . The vaccine study contain several part . The first part call antigen . These antigens `` fingerprint '' find many cancer cell , especially ovary , fallopian tube , peritoneal cavity ( inside line abdomen ) The purpose study see investigator help immune system recognize cancer cell normal remove .
DOC.brief_title: Unimolecular Pentavalent ( Globo-H-GM2-sTn-TF-Tn ) Immunization Patients With Epithelial Ovarian , Fallopian Tube , Peritoneal Cancer First Remission
DOC.criteria: Any histologically document stage III IV epithelial carcinoma arise ovary , fallopian tube peritoneum . History cytoreductive surgery chemotherapy least one platinumbased chemotherapy regimen part primary treatment . Patients must first complete clinical remission . Complete clinical remission define serum CA125 within institutional normal limit , negative physical examination , definite evidence disease compute tomography ( CT ) abdomen pelvis . Lymph node and/or soft tissue abnormality ≤ 1.0cm often present pelvis consider definite evidence disease . Eligibility determine anatomical imaging ( ie . MRI CT ) . Positive PET image ( perform ) exclude patient criterion meet anatomical imaging negative . Adequate organ function define Bone marrow function : Absolute neutrophil count ( ANC ) great equal 1,000/mm³ , grade 1 . Platelets great equal 100,000/mm³ . Renal function : Serum creatinine less equal 1.5 x institutional upper limit normal ( ULN ) , CTCAE v4.0 grade 1 . Hepatic function : Bilirubin , SGOT , alkaline phosphatase less equal 2.5 x ULN Negative stool hemoccult ( negative endoscopic evaluation positive ) . External hemorrhoid common source positive hemoccult exclude patient . TSH elevate normal range KPS > = 80 % . Patients sign informed consent document sign authorization permitting release personal health information . Age > 18 year Patients must recover clinically significant side effect prior chemotherapy Pregnant nursing woman Patients invasive malignancy ( ) evidence cancer present within last 5 year , whose previous cancer treatment contraindicate protocol therapy exclude . Nonmelanoma skin cancer exception exclude patient . Patients history seafood allergy . Patients previously receive vaccine antigens current trial . Patients history immunodeficiency autoimmune disease ( exclude treat hypothyroidism ) . Patients active CNS tumor .
